column1:
Sounds like malarkey

#CoronaVirus!  Just like pasta: 
invented in China and spread by the Italians

And that's the bare minimum.  As more succumb, the % will only increase.  An infinite sum equation would approach 2x.  So prob ~10% in actuality.
